name: Rahil's Paradox DEMO
description:
Press Ctrl+F twice for full screen

---------

So I was working on a game called Rahil's Paradox

But due to a faulty line of code ... I lost access to my own game.

This is where you come in player...

Here is a small portion of the game, just to see if you are ready for the full thing.

Play the game to get the game back. If it all sounds too complicated don't worry my AI program Rahlka will brief you in-game.

Try it out, share it with your friends.

Help me get my game back.

--------

[My advice is to play the DEMO before playing the full game... You will learn about the game and it's world a bit.  Also there might be references! Continue to spread the LOVE] - Rahil out of Game Log 2

--------
